short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A job tracker for job hunting, allowing you to save and manage job listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JOB Quest Tracker, your essential companion for seamlessly managing your job hunt right from your Chrome browser. Whether you're exploring job opportunities or actively applying, JOB Quest Tracker empowers you to efficiently organize and track your job search efforts with its intuitive features.

Steps :

1. Install the Extension: Visit the Chrome Web Store and add JobQuest Tracker to your browser extensions.

2. Navigate to Job Listings: Browse through job listings on your preferred job search websites.

3. Save Job URLs: When you find a job listing you're interested in, simply click on the JobQuest Tracker extension icon in your browser.

4. Save the URL: A pop-up window will appear, allowing you to save the URL of the job listing with just one click.

5. Repeat as Needed: Continue browsing and saving job listings by repeating steps 2-4 for each desired opportunity.

6. Download Saved URLs: To download your list of saved job URLs, click on the JobQuest Tracker extension icon again.

7. Access Download Option: Select the option to download your saved URLs as an Excel file.

8. Save the File: Choose a location on your device to save the Excel file containing your job URLs.

9. Upload Excel Files (Optional): If you have an Excel file containing job URLs from another source, you can upload it to JobQuest Tracker.

10. Access Upload Option: Click on the JobQuest Tracker extension icon and select the option to upload an Excel file.

11. Choose File: Select the Excel file from your device that you want to upload to the extension.

12. Track Your Job Search: With all your job URLs conveniently stored and organised within JobQuest Tracker, you can easily track your job search progress and manage your opportunities effectively.

With JOB Quest Tracker, you can effortlessly save job URLs directly from your browser. Simply navigate to the job listings you're interested in, and with a single click, store the URL within the extension. This convenient feature eliminates the hassle of manually copying and pasting URLs, ensuring you never lose track of valuable opportunities.

But that's just the beginning. JOB Quest Tracker goes beyond simple URL storage by offering robust functionality to streamline your job search process. Need to compile a comprehensive list of your saved job URLs for reference or analysis? No problem. JOB Quest Tracker enables you to download your list of saved URLs as an Excel file with ease. This downloadable file provides you with a neatly organized overview of your job prospects, allowing for efficient tracking and management.

Moreover, JOB Quest Tracker understands the importance of flexibility in managing your job search data. Whether you're transitioning between devices or prefer to work offline, JOB Quest Tracker accommodates your needs by allowing you to upload Excel files containing job URLs back into the extension. This bidirectional functionality ensures seamless synchronization of your job search progress across different platforms, giving you the freedom to access and update your data whenever and wherever you need it.

With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, JOB Quest Tracker empowers you to take control of your job search journey. Say goodbye to scattered bookmarks and tedious manual tracking methods. With JOB Quest Tracker, you can organize, track, and optimize your job search efforts with efficiency and ease—all within the familiar environment of your Chrome browser.

Download JOB Quest Tracker today and elevate your job search experience to new heights. Streamline your workflow, stay organized, and unlock greater opportunities with this indispensable Chrome extension. Your next career move awaits—let JOB Quest Tracker guide you every step of the way.
